hadiths.text: Narrated Jabir bin `Abdullah:I went to the Prophet (ﷺ) in the mosque (the sub-narrator Mis`ar thought that Jabir had said, "In the forenoon.") He ordered me to pray two rak`at. He owed me some money and he repaid it to me and gave more than what was due to me

chapter.ara-name: باب الصَّلاَةِ إِذَا قَدِمَ مِنْ سَفَرٍ
chapter.eng-name: To offer As-Salat (the prayer) whe returning from a journey
